title: AirZone Singapore: Elevated Net Fun at City Square
blurb: Experience Singapore's first air-suspended net playground across three levels for unique thrills.
description: AirZone Singapore at City Square Mall offers a unique and thrilling experience with three levels of elevated, air-suspended net playgrounds. Visitors can spring and bounce in the middle of the mall, with the first level featuring a large ball pit. It's an activity suitable for all ages who can walk and climb unassisted.
datetime_display: Mondays to Fridays 10 am to 8.30 pm; Weekends & Public Holidays 10 am to 9.30 pm

title: Amazonia Family Fun Centre: Ice World Adventure
blurb: Discover Amazonia's 'Ice World' with climbing walls, slides, and obstacle courses.
description: Amazonia Family Fun Centre is an indoor playground designed for fun and safe play with an 'Ice World' theme. It features a super large, 3000+ square feet play-gym, a 10-meter high wave slide (the highest in Singapore), climbing walls, and obstacle courses, catering to both younger and older children.
datetime_display: 10 am to 8 pm, daily

title: Amped Trampoline Park: Bounce, Jump, and Play
blurb: Go wild at Amped Trampoline Park with jump zones, power tower, and basketball.
description: Amped Trampoline Park offers a variety of bouncing activities including a Jump Zone, Power Tower, and a Basketball Machine for shooting hoops. It also features an interactive wall game and a fast reaction station, providing endless fun for kids.
datetime_display: Monday to Friday, 10 am to 7 pm; Saturday, Sunday and Public Holiday, 10 am to 7 pm

title: BOUNCE Singapore: Adrenaline-Filled Trampoline Fun
blurb: Experience air time and extreme jumps at BOUNCE Singapore's eight arenas.
description: BOUNCE Singapore at Cineleisure is equipped with facilities for both casual jumpers and practitioners looking to try skills across eight adrenaline-filled arenas. Highlights include 28 trampolines in the Free Jumping Arena, high-performance trampolines, a dodgeball court, an obstacle course, and an elevated platform for leaps of faith. Suitable for all ages.
datetime_display: Mondays to Thursdays 10 am to 8 pm, Fridays 10 am to 9 pm, Saturdays and Public Holidays 9 am to 9 pm, Sundays 9 am to 8 pm

title: Bouncetopia by Kiztopia at VivoCity: Castle Themed Fun
blurb: Explore six unique play concepts, including giant bouncy castles and a sand pit.
description: Bouncetopia by Kiztopia at VivoCity is a 6,400 square feet indoor playground featuring six unique play concepts. These include three giant castle-themed bouncy castles, a spacious ball pit, a sand pit, and a creative art & craft zone, offering diverse fun for children aged 0 to 12 years.
price_display: Admission prices start from $19.80, free for children below 1 year old.
datetime_display: Check website for operating hours

title: buds by Shangri-La: Immersive Learning Through Play
blurb: A curated play space for children to learn through creative and experiential play.
description: buds by Shangri-La is an immersive 1,800+ square meter play space combining indoor and outdoor activity areas. It features a Bake room, Stage, music studio, Muddy art room, and 'Splash', a water playground. Designed for children aged 6 months to 12 years, it encourages self-directed and experiential learning.
price_display: Admission prices are $48 nett per child for 3-hour play time (Non-Peak Rate) and $68 nett per child for 3-hour play time (Peak Rate), including access to buds and Splash.
datetime_display: Check website for operating hours

title: Capybara Creek: Multi-Zone Play at Kallang Leisure Park
blurb: Four distinct play zones, including a ball pit with slides and a trampoline zone.
description: Capybara Creek at Kallang Leisure Park features four distinct play zones catering to various interests. Highlights include a ball pit connected to three slides (including a four-lane slide for families), a trampoline zone, and a play pretend area, offering diverse entertainment.
datetime_display: Check website for operating hours

title: Future World: Art Installations at ArtScience Museum
blurb: Interact with art installations and creative projects for all ages.
description: Future World at ArtScience Museum offers interactive art installations and creative projects designed for engagement, play, and exploration by both adults and children. These pieces also serve as reflective works, encouraging contemplation on our relationship with the world.
price_display: Admission prices start from $25 for adults and $20 for children.
datetime_display: 10 am to 7 pm, daily

title: Hip Kids Club Playground: Fun at Forum The Shopping Mall
blurb: An indoor playground with climbing frames, ball pit, and ride-on bikes.
description: Hip Kids Club Playground, located on Level 2 of Forum The Shopping Mall, features climbing frames, balance beams, a circus tent, ride-on bikes, a slide, rubber floors, and a ball pit. A one-year membership is available for regular visitors.
datetime_display: Monday to Friday 11.30 am to 1.30 pm, 3 pm to 6 pm; Weekends 10.30 am to 6 pm

title: IKEA Alexandra Småland: Magical Forest Play for Kids
blurb: A magical forest-themed play area with a ball pond and quiet nooks.
description: IKEA Alexandra Småland is a free, magical forest-themed play area designed to entertain children aged 4 to 9, with height restrictions between 90 cm to 120 cm. It includes a ball pond and quiet nooks for children seeking a calmer play experience.
datetime_display: Last admission on Sunday to Thursday: 8 pm; Last admission on Friday to Saturday: 9 pm

title: Impressions Kids Club: Bespoke Play at Tanglin Mall
blurb: A bespoke play area with dramatic and sensory play for younger kids.
description: Impressions Kids Club in Tanglin Mall offers a bespoke play area featuring an indoor playground with dramatic and sensory play areas designed to entertain younger children for hours. Parents can relax at the comfortable café or utilize experienced childminders.
datetime_display: 9 am to 6 pm daily

title: The Joy of Toys: Open-Ended Play at Clarke Quay Central
blurb: A unique concept focusing on open-ended play with high-quality toys.
description: The Joy of Toys at Clarke Quay Central offers a unique concept focused on open-ended play in relaxing, homely spaces. It features a Main Play Space and a Toddler Play Space with a wide variety of high-quality, age-appropriate toys for babies, toddlers, and school-going children.
datetime_display: 10 am to 8 pm daily

title: Kidodo Indoor Playground: Vibrant Fun at City Square Mall
blurb: A vibrant indoor playground offering educational concept play and climbing frames.
description: Kidodo Indoor Playground at City Square Mall is a smaller, yet vibrant play space with various facilities for children. Kids can enjoy educational concept play focused on space and explore the playground's climbing frame.
datetime_display: Mondays to Thursday, 11 am to 8 pm; Friday to Sunday, 11 am to 9 pm

title: Kidz Amaze, SAFRA Toa Payoh: Multi-Level Climbing Fun
blurb: A spacious indoor playground with multi-layered climbing frames and a ball pit.
description: SAFRA Toa Payoh’s Kidz Amaze is a spacious indoor playground featuring multi-layered climbing frames with various nooks and crannies for exploration. It also includes different play areas like a large ball pond for kids to enjoy.
price_display: Admission prices start from $10, free for babies below 12 months.
datetime_display: Monday to Friday 1 pm to 7 pm; Weekends and Public Holidays 10 am to 9 pm, School Holiday Weekdays 10 am to 7 pm

title: KidZania Singapore: A City Just for Kids Returns
blurb: The ultimate indoor play city where kids try out various jobs and earn 'cash'.
description: KidZania Singapore is making a comeback to Sentosa’s Palawan Beach, slated to open in Q1 2024. This ultimate indoor play city allows kids to experience various jobs at different establishments, earning 'cash' that can be used to redeem items.
datetime_display: Check website for operating hours

title: Kiztopia, Marina Square: Mega Fun Utopia for Kids
blurb: An 18,000 sq ft fun utopia with 18 play areas, including mega slides and a ball pit.
description: Kiztopia Marina Square is an 18,000 square feet indoor playground featuring up to 18 play areas. These include two-story high slides, a mega ball pit, interactive play zones, and role-play rooms, making it one of Singapore's largest indoor playgrounds for kids to enjoy.
datetime_display: Sunday to Thursday, 10 am to 8 pm; Friday, Saturday and Public Holiday, 10 am to 9 pm

title: Kidodo Space at Suntec City: Compact Space-Themed Adventure
blurb: A compact, brightly lit space-themed indoor playground at Suntec City.
description: Centrally located at Suntec City Tower 3, Kidodo Space offers a compact yet adventure-packed space-themed experience. The brightly lit center with positive energy and vibrant colors of the space universe provides a fun environment for kids.
datetime_display: Check website for operating hours

title: Keppel Centre for Art Education: Creative Play at National Gallery
blurb: Encourages creativity through play with seven immersive spaces for art and exploration.
description: The newly revamped Keppel Centre for Art Education at National Gallery Singapore is a free-to-enter gem for children aged 4 to 10. It features seven immersive spaces for learning, exploration, and art creation. Visitors can book 1 hour 15 minute slots and join weekend drop-in classes.
datetime_display: Daily 10 am to 7 pm

title: Kidzy Way Indoor Playground: Safe Play at Robertson Walk
blurb: A safe play-gym with soft-fall floor, trampolines, and obstacle courses.
description: Kidzy Way Indoor Playground at Robertson Walk offers a safe environment with a soft-fall floor and padded equipment. It includes trampolines, obstacle courses, a climbing wall, slides, swings, building blocks, a ball pond, and a play kitchen and playhouse. It also hosts birthday parties.
datetime_display: 9 am to 9 pm daily

title: PIP’s PLAYbox: Bright & Airy Play at Esplanade
blurb: A bright, airy space at Esplanade, designed as a home for its mascot, PIP.
description: Located on Level 4 of Esplanade – Theatres on the Bay, PIP’s PLAYbox is a bright and airy free play space. Designed as a home for the mascot PIP, it features a glass wall and broad beams, providing a welcoming environment for children.
datetime_display: Mon to Sun, 11 am to 6 pm

title: Pororo Park Singapore: Character-Based Play at Marina Square
blurb: A character-based indoor play park featuring Pororo the Little Penguin and friends.
description: Pororo Park Singapore at Marina Square is a character-based indoor play park inspired by the popular 'Pororo the Little Penguin' animation series. It features attractions designed for group play environments, making it ideal for fans of Pororo and his friends.
price_display: Tickets start from $38 for one child, and include admission for one adult, for two hours.
datetime_display: Monday to Sunday, 10.30 am to 8 pm

title: Pirate Land, The Centrepoint: Diverse Play & VR Experiences
blurb: Offers toy brick street, jungle gym, ball ponds, and virtual reality games.
description: Pirate Land at The Centrepoint is an indoor playground offering a variety of play spaces including a toy brick street, a jungle gym, and ball ponds. It also features virtual reality play spaces such as VR shooting games and escape rooms.
price_display: Admission prices start from $12.50 for members.
datetime_display: Monday to Friday, 10.30 am to 8 pm; Saturday and Sunday, 10.30 am to 9 pm

title: Nekoland, The Polliwogs, Clarke Quay Central: Cats & Play
blurb: Interact with cats and enjoy a fully padded play area with mega slides.
description: Nekoland at The Polliwogs, Clarke Quay Central, combines cat interaction with a fully padded indoor playground. The play area includes a mirror maze, bouncy nets, mega slides, and an air gun range, providing endless hours of fun for children of all ages, along with an opportunity to foster empathy for cats.
price_display: Admission prices start from $24, with an additional $12 for 30 minutes at the Cat Interaction Zone.
datetime_display: 10 am to 8 pm

title: The Polliwogs, VivoCity: Pioneer Indoor Playground Fun
blurb: A popular recreation center with imaginative play arenas and thrilling slides.
description: Since 2009, The Polliwogs at VivoCity has been a pioneer in Singapore's indoor playground scene. This premium playground offers endless fun for children of all ages with colorful, imaginative play arenas, thrilling slides, climbing structures, and sensory play areas, ideal for daily visits or birthday parties.
datetime_display: Sunday to Thursday, 9.30 am to 7.30 pm; Friday to Saturday, 9.30 am to 8.30 pm

title: SkyPark By Kiztopia at Orchard Cineleisure: High Elements Thrills
blurb: A dynamic play park with rock climbing and high elements for ages six and up.
description: SkyPark By Kiztopia at Orchard Cineleisure is an 8,000+ square feet dynamic play park designed for ages six and up, including teenagers and adults. Its main highlight is an impressive multi-level play structure featuring rock climbing and high elements, fostering challenges and friendly competition.
datetime_display: Check website for operating hours

title: SMIGY, Tiong Bahru Plaza: Pastel Play & Pretend Stations
blurb: Features a sandpit, race track, and pretend play stations in pastel shades.
description: The SMIGY outlet at Tiong Bahru Plaza offers various play elements including a sandpit, a race track, and pretend play stations stocked with toys. Kids can also enjoy the ball pond and explore the different pastel-shaded play structures within the indoor playground.
datetime_display: 10 am to 8 pm daily

title: SMIGY, United Square Shopping Mall: Bright & Inviting Play
blurb: A bright indoor playground with beloved play elements, including slides to a hinoki block sandpit.
description: The SMIGY outlet at United Square Shopping Mall is a bright and inviting indoor playground offering play elements children love. A unique feature is the slides that lead directly into a hinoki block sandpit.
datetime_display: 10 am to 8 pm daily

title: Sunshine Childhood Playland, HarbourFront Centre: Diverse Fun
blurb: Cubby houses, climbing frames, ball pit, and a sensory play area with plastic beads.
description: Sunshine Childhood Playland at HarbourFront Centre offers a diverse range of activities. It features cubby houses (supermarket, doctor’s clinic, kitchen), a main climbing frame with slides leading to a sizeable ball pit, and a sensory play area filled with plastic beads, ensuring pleasant occupation for children.
datetime_display: Monday to Thursday, 11 am to 8 pm; Friday / Weekends / Public Holidays, 11 am to 9 pm

title: SuperPark Singapore: Over 20 Activities at Suntec City
blurb: An indoor fun center with over 20 activities including trampolines and AR games.
description: SuperPark Singapore at Suntec City is an indoor fun center boasting over 20 activities for all ages. Visitors can engage in various sports like baseball, basketball, and futsal. Highlights include trampolines with AR games for competitive bouncing and dedicated freestyle trampoline areas.
price_display: Admission prices start from $22.90, free for children below 1 year old.
datetime_display: Tuesday to Friday, 10.30 am to 8 pm; Weekends & Public Holidays, 9 am to 9 pm

title: Waka Waka, Annex @ Furama: Safari-Themed Adventure
blurb: A safari-themed indoor playground with hidden spaces and hanging trapeze structures.
description: Waka Waka, located at Annex@Furama, is a safari-themed indoor playground for children aged 9 months to 12 years. Young adventurers can explore hidden spaces, enjoy hanging trapeze structures, and slide through various sections with colorful equipment for climbing, leaping, and racing.
datetime_display: Thursday and Friday, 10 am to 6 pm; Saturday and Sunday, 10 am to 8 pm; School Holidays: Monday to Friday, 10 am to 6 pm; Saturday and Sunday, 10 am to 8 pm

title: X-Scap8: High Elements, Smash Lab & Arcade at Orchard
blurb: An indoor activity center with high elements, Smash Lab, and arcade games.
description: X-Scap8, located in Orchard Central, is an indoor activity center offering a high elements course, the X-Warrior Challenge course, and a unique Smash Lab where players can relieve stress. It also features arcade games and a golfing simulator, catering to all ages.
datetime_display: 11 am to 10 pm, daily

title: Adventure HQ at HomeTeamNS Khatib: Largest Indoor Adventure
blurb: Singapore's largest indoor multi-installation adventure center with unique features.
description: Adventure HQ at HomeTeamNS Khatib is Singapore's largest indoor multi-installation adventure center. It features the country's first indoor roll glider, longest 14-meter indoor slide, first 165-meter indoor artificial cave, and largest two-tiered indoor challenge ropes course. With eight main sections, some require Adventure Specialist supervision, and parental accompaniment is advised for children under 9. Minimum height of 1.25 meters and maximum weight of 120 kg apply.
datetime_display: Tuesday, 2 pm to 5.30 pm; Wednesday to Friday, 2 pm to 5.30 pm, 6 pm to 9.30 pm; Weekends, Eve of Public Holiday and Public Holiday and School Holidays, 10 am to 1.30 pm, 2 pm to 5.30 pm, 6 pm to 9.30 pm

title: Jolly Fields, Ang Mo Kio Hub: Farming-Themed Play Pit
blurb: A seeds-filled play pit for kids aged 1-7, focused on farming-themed activities.
description: Jolly Fields at Ang Mo Kio Hub is a unique seeds-filled play pit equipped with tools for children aged 1 to 7 years. It encourages 'D.I.G' (Discover, Imaginative play, and Gross motor skills) through farming-themed dig and play activities.
datetime_display: Weekdays, 11 am to 8.30 pm; Weekends, 10.30 am to 9 pm

title: Kiztopia at Punggol Town Square: Safari-Themed Duplex Play
blurb: A 5,500 sq ft safari-themed duplex indoor playground with 12 play concepts.
description: Kiztopia Club Punggol is a 5,500 square feet safari-themed duplex indoor playground featuring up to 12 different play concepts. These include role-play rooms, slides, AR interactive games, a sandpit, trampoline, and obstacle courses. Visitors can also enjoy food at Vibes Café.
price_display: Admission prices start from $19.80, free for children below 1 year old.
datetime_display: Check website for operating hours

title: Kidztropic, Poiz Centre: Cozy Family Edutainment Centre
blurb: A cozy indoor 'family edutainment centre' with slides, trampolines, and sensory toys.
description: Kidztropic at Poiz Centre is a cozy indoor 'family edutainment centre' designed to promote teamwork and confidence through fun and educational family activities. The indoor playground area includes slides, trampolines, climbing walls, pretend play, and a section with sensory toys for children aged 6 and below.
price_display: Admission prices start from $15 per hour.
datetime_display: Tuesday to Fridays, 2 pm to 7 pm; Weekends and Public Holidays, 10 am to 8 pm
venue_name: Poiz Centre at Upper Serangoon Road

title: Little Bear’s House, Serangoon Gardens: Toddler Play Space
blurb: A clean, comfortable 2,500 sq ft indoor playground with various toy sections.
description: Little Bear’s House is a 2,500 square feet indoor playground located in a shop house at Serangoon Gardens. It provides a clean and comfortable environment with different sections of toys, making it a good toddler play space for children aged 9 months and up.
datetime_display: 9 am to 7 pm daily

title: Merry Haus, Oasis Terraces: Popular Playground & Café
blurb: A popular indoor playground with a ball pool, slide, trampoline, and an art jamming session.
description: Merry Haus Playground, located in Oasis Terraces, Punggol, is a popular indoor playground featuring a claw machine, ball pool, slide, trampoline, mega blocks, pretend-play toy kitchen, and more. It also offers a two-hour play and art jamming session, and the Merry Haus café serves delicious treats.
datetime_display: Weekdays 12 pm to 9 pm; Weekends 11 am to 9 pm.

title: My Little Climbing Room: Safe Climbing for Kids
blurb: A safe, air-conditioned climbing space designed for kids aged 2-12 years.
description: My Little Climbing Room at The Promenade at Pelikat is a safe climbing space specifically designed for children aged 2 to 12 years. The climbing walls are intentionally kept low and less intimidating, and the bouldering wall is well-padded for protection. The facility is fully air-conditioned and cleaned daily.
price_display: Admission price is $33 per child for one hour of drop-off fun climb.
datetime_display: Thursday and Friday 2.15 pm to 6 pm; Weekends & Public Holidays 9.15 am to 6 pm

title: Splash @ Kidz Amaze, SAFRA Punggol: Indoor Water Fun
blurb: An impressive 23,000 sq ft indoor water playground with five slides and eight play decks.
description: Splash @ Kidz Amaze at SAFRA Punggol is an impressive 23,000 square feet indoor water playground. It features visually stunning interactive play elements with five slides and eight play decks interconnected by climbing structures, including a separate wading area for toddlers. Suitable for all ages.
price_display: Admission prices start from $10, free for babies below 12 months.
datetime_display: Monday to Friday, 1 pm to 7 pm; Weekends and Public Holidays, 10 am to 9 pm; School Holidays: Weekdays, 10 am to 7 pm

title: Sunshine Childhood Playland, Buangkok Square Mall: Cheerful Centre
blurb: A cheerful centre with climbing frames, slides, ball pit, and a sensory play area.
description: Sunshine Childhood Playland at Buangkok Square Mall offers a variety of activities to keep children occupied. It features a climbing frame with slides leading into a ball pit, and a sensory play area filled with toys for kids to enjoy at the cheery-looking center.
datetime_display: Monday to Thursday : 11 am to 8 pm, Friday/Weekends/PH : 11 am to 9 pm

title: Fun-filled Role Play and Ball Pit Adventures
blurb: Explore cubby houses, role play stations, and a huge ball pit!
description: Sunshine Childhood Playland has a little bit of everything to keep children pleasantly occupied. These include cubby houses which included a supermarket, a doctor’s clinic, and of course, a kitchen. The role play stations were stocked with toys and props. The main climbing frame has slides that lead straight into the ball pit which is sizeable in itself. Sunshine Childhood Playland’s sensory play area is filled with little plastic beads that are really quite lovely to the touch.
datetime_display: Monday to Thursday, 11 am to 8 pm; Friday / Weekends / Public Holidays, 11 am to 9 pm

title: Climbing Frames, Play Pits & Bouncy Fun
blurb: Main climbing frame, play pit, ride-on toys, and trampolines!
description: Sunshine Childhood Playland at The Seletar Mall has a climbing frame as the main play space as well as a play pit with toys that younger kids can play with. There are also ride-on toys and bouncy trampolines within this small indoor playground.
datetime_display: Monday to Thursday, 11 am to 8 pm; Friday / Weekends / Public Holidays, 11 am to 9 pm

title: Singapore's First Peranakan Themed Indoor Playground
blurb: Tradition meets fun with Dragon & Pelican playground designs.
description: As Singapore’s first Peranakan themed indoor playground, T-Play at HomeTeamNS Khatib mixes a tinge of tradition with boundless fun. We love HomeTeamNS’ nod to Singapore’s old playgrounds that is showcased through the designs at the playground, with the Dragon-themed slide and Pelican playground designs on the equipment.
datetime_display: Tuesday to Thursday, 1 pm to 7 pm; Friday & Eve of Public Holiday, 1 pm to 9 pm; Weekends, School Holiday & Public Holidays 10 am to 9 pm

title: Digital Active Experience with AR Elements
blurb: Motion capture and AR tech for a gamified active play.
description: One of the best indoor playgrounds in the east of Singapore for older kids, Action Motion at HomeTeamNS Bedok Reservoir makes use of motion capture technology and AR elements so that players can jump while playing mini games on the screen. By the same team behind Adventure HQ and Clip ‘n Climb HomeTeamNS, Action Motion indoor playground at HomeTeamNS Bedok Reservoir is a digital active experience arena in Singapore. What set this apart from the usual indoor playgrounds is its unique incorporation of AR elements across its installations. Visitors will be able to score points while playing and tabulate their scores through Action Motion’s gamified system.
age_group_display: Minimum height of 1.25 m and maximum weight of 120 kg
datetime_display: Tuesday to Friday, 12 pm to 2.30 pm, 3 pm to 5.30 pm, 6 pm to 8.30pm; Saturday, Sunday, eve of Public Holiday, Public Holiday & School Holiday, 10 am to 12.30 pm, 1 pm to 3.30 pm, 4 pm to 6.30 pm, 7 pm to 9.30 pm

title: Steampunk-themed Indoor Water Park Fun
blurb: Splashing day out at this unique indoor water park!
description: At Aqua Adventure in Bedok at HomeTeamNS Bedok Reservoir, the weather will never be a consideration when you want to have splashing day out at the water park. Sprays, bucket splashes, dials and gears add on the air of fun and excitement at the steampunk-themed water park. At the heart of Aqua Adventure is a 1.2 metre deep pool. The Laze Pool is where you can get a soak and contemplate which play element to do around the water park. You can also head up to the second level of the water park where there are various play elements such as climbing nets and climbing walls.
datetime_display: Tuesday to Sunday, eve of Public Holiday, Public Holiday, School Holiday: Time slots: 10 am to 3 pm, 4 pm to 9 pm

title: Encounter with Arts for Children Ages 0-12
blurb: Interactive art installations and programs for young kids.
description: The Artground offers a place for children between 0 to 12 to have an encounter with the arts. It is also a space where artists can collaborate to develop programmes that reach out to young children. Kids from ages of two and up can look forward to interactive art installations that will be refreshed three times a year.
price_display: Free but with a $15 refundable deposit for up to five persons.
datetime_display: Wednesday to Friday, 2 pm to 3.15 pm, 3.45 pm to 5 pm; Weekends and Public Holidays, 9.15 am to 10.30 am, 10.45 am to 12 pm, 2 to 3.15 pm, 3.45 pm to 5 pm

title: Montessori-Inspired Play for Young Children
blurb: Two Montessori spaces with quality toys and engaging classes.
description: Better Play is an indoor playground for younger children that provides two Montessori-inspired spaces, providing a huge range of high-quality toys and classes that encourage focused engagement and learning for children aged six months to six years in a relaxed environment. Classes include music for babies and toddlers as well as sensory and crafting sessions. All classes include at least 45 minutes of free play. Better Play was founded by parents of young children for parents with young children.
price_display: From $23 for two hours for one child and one adult
datetime_display: Monday & Thursday, 10 am to 5.30 pm; Tuesday, Wednesday & Friday, 10 am to 6 pm; Saturday & Sunday, 9.30 am to 5.30 pm

title: Whimsical Gardens & Unique Play Attractions
blurb: Gardens, amazing views, slides, nets, and mazes for all ages.
description: Canopy Park at Jewel Changi Airport brings a world of play and fun attractions for all ages indoors at the at the top of the mall. With whimsical gardens, amazing views and one-of-a-kind play attractions such as slides, nets and mazes, Canopy Park offers a variety of play opportunities for both kids and adults.
price_display: From $6 for admission to Canopy Park. Pay for additional attractions such the bouncy nets and mazes.
datetime_display: Monday to Thursdays, 10 am to 10 pm; Friday to Sunday, Public Holiday and Eve of Public Holiday, 10 am to 11 pm

title: Immersive Fun-filled Play Zones for Younger Kids
blurb: Diverse play zones built for an immersive and fun experience.
description: Pirate Land Eastpoint is a new indoor playground in Simei built with younger kids in mind promises an immersive and fun-filled experience in its diverse play zones, even though the play zones are not necessarily pirate-themed. Read more about what you can expect to find at Pirate Land, Eastpoint.
datetime_display: Check website for hours

title: Seeds-filled Play Pit for Farming-Themed Fun
blurb: Discover, Imagine, and develop Gross motor skills through play.
description: Jolly Fields is a seeds-filled play pit, equipped with tools for kids between 1 to 7 years old, to immerse in farming-themed dig and play activities. It is built on the concept of D.I.G – Discover, Imaginative play and Gross motor skills.
datetime_display: Weekdays, 11 am to 8.30 pm; Weekends, 10.30 am to 10 pm

title: Farming-themed Play Pit at Kallang Wave Mall
blurb: Develop social and motor skills through imaginative play.
description: Jolly Fields is a seeds-filled play pit indoor playground, equipped with tools for kids between 1 to 7 years old, to immerse in farming-themed dig and play activities. It is built on the concept of D.I.G – Discover, Imaginative play and Gross motor skills. In this way, Jolly Fields targets the development of social and motor skills through PLAY.
datetime_display: Weekdays, 11 am to 8.30 pm; Weekends, 10.30 am to 9 pm

title: Creative Intelligence with Blue Foam Blocks
blurb: Spacious play area with unique blue foam blocks for building.
description: Kaboodle is an indoor playground designed to develop the creative intelligence of children ages 1 to 12. The main play area is spacious and flooded with natural light. Here, children will find large and medium size waterproof foam blue blocks from Imagination Playground, a brand conceived by award-winning American architect, David Rockwell. There are cubes, bricks, cogs, curves, and cylinders – a wide variety of pieces that fit together to become anything the children can think up! The only thing holding them back would be their imagination.
datetime_display: Wed to Sun, 9 am to 5 pm; Monday, 9 am to 1 pm (half day)

title: Aviation-Themed Wonderland in Jewel Changi
blurb: Funnel slide, ball pit, trampolines, and obstacle courses.
description: Let your dreams take flight at our all-new aviation-themed wonderland nestled within Jewel Changi! Covering 4,500 sq ft and conveniently located inside Toys “R” Us, this playground boasts unique features, including a colossal funnel slide that descends into an ocean ball pit, an interactive ball-shooting game wall, trampolines and challenging obstacle courses!
price_display: From $12, children under 12 months enter for free when accompanied by a paying caregiver
datetime_display: Sunday to Thursday 10 am to 10 pm, Friday/Saturday/Public Holidays 10 am to 9 pm

title: Underwater Exploration at Woodleigh Mall
blurb: Mega ball pits, trampoline, role-play room, and sand pit.
description: Venture into the ‘deep blue sea’ and uncover 3,000 sq ft of ‘underwater exploration’ such as mega ball pits, trampoline, role-play room, sand pit and more at the Kiztopia Club indoor playground at The Woodleigh Mall. Climb through challenging obstacle courses and navigate your way through a submarine and exit at high speed into pools of mini ocean balls.
datetime_display: Check website for hours

title: Tayo-themed Play with Co-working Space
blurb: Eight activity zones for little ones, plus a parent workspace.
description: Petite Tayo Kids Club in Kallang Wave Mall has a convenient add on catered to working parents with young children. This is the first-ever Tayo character-based indoor playground with a cosy working space, making it easy for parents to multitask while their child plays in an indoor playground that spans an area size of 1,500-square- feet space. Little ones can look forward to exploring more than eight different activity zones, such as a music room, supermarkets, climbing walls, a car track and more.
price_display: From $10, free for children below 9 months
datetime_display: Weekday, 10 am to 8 pm; Weekends and Public Holidays, 9.30 am to 8 pm

title: Cartoon Network Themed Indoor Playspace (Closing Soon)
blurb: Five play areas including ball pits, slides, and obstacle courses.
description: PLAY! by Kinderplay is a sprawling 3,000 square feet playspace with five main play areas for the tiniest tots to gregarious 10 year olds. All the wall visuals, colours of the different playspaces and elements were all in the colours of well-loved cartoons from Cartoon Network. It was like stepping into the secret walls of Cartoon Network which unveiled a play paradise for kids. PLAY! by Kinderplay consists of five main play areas: a bouncy minesweeper, a mega ball pit with slides and anti-gravitational wind machine, a ball blaster arena, bouncy balloons area and obstacle courses to exhaust the little kids to bits.
datetime_display: Weekdays, 11 am to 9 pm; Fridays & Weekends & Public Holidays, 11 am to 10 pm

title: Thoughtful Play Space within Tampines Library
blurb: Clean, accessible, and engaging play options for families.
description: The Jolly Jungle indoor playground at Our Tampines Hub is an absolutely thoughtful and lovely new play space located within the Tampines Regional Library that provides an ideal space for families. This playground is smartly designed, combining cleanliness, accessibility, and a variety of engaging play options. An interesting feature is its treehouse. Unlike traditional playground structures, this treehouse is made up of bands that form layers of net for climbing. This design allows children to either sit at different levels or climb up and down safely.
datetime_display: Check website for hours

title: Magical Forest Playland at IKEA Tampines
blurb: Jump, climb, run, and bounce freely in a wondrous setting.
description: While the adults go shopping, the little ones can head to Smaland at IKEA Tampines! It is a magical forest with spider webs strong enough to climb, clogs so huge you can hide inside. Children can jump, climb, run and bounce freely. There is also a silent and cam forest where children can watch a movie or just rest under a tree.
datetime_display: 10 am to 10 pm daily

title: Bright, Pastel-Coloured Playground with Eight Stations
blurb: Ball pits, play-pretend zones, costumes, and obstacle courses.
description: The original SMIGY outlet at Paya Lebar Quarter is a bright, pastel-coloured playground with a cheery façade. It has eight stations with ball pits, play-pretend zones, costumes, interactive touchscreen, obstacle courses, sponge pit and swings.
datetime_display: 10 am to 8 pm daily

title: Tayo-themed Wonderland with Road Circuit & Play
blurb: Spanning 10,000 sq ft, offering fun and learning activities.
description: Spanning a vast space of 10,000 square feet, Tayo Station is suitable for children ages 0 to 12 years old, and is home to plenty of indoor play activities, providing more fun and learning for kids. For any child who loves the Tayo animated series, Tayo Station at Downtown East will be a wonderland of fun and excitement with the Tayo Road Circuit, Gani’s Playground and more.
datetime_display: Monday to Friday, 10.30 am to 8 pm; Sat, Sun, School Holidays & Public Holidays, 10.30 am to 9 pm

title: Royal-themed Dress-up Indoor Playland
blurb: Promotes creative and imaginative play in a magical setting.
description: The Tiara Society is a royal-themed dress-up indoor playland at Coastal PlayGrove that promotes creative and imaginative play in a magical fairytale setting. There is an extensive walk-in wardrobe with over 200 costumes for both children and adults. See your princess and prince glide through quality toys and props for hours of play at the Outdoor gardens and Baby Play chamber.
datetime_display: 9 am to 6.30 pm daily

title: Forest-themed Play with Climbing & Ball Pit
blurb: Climbing walls, ball pit, and foam building blocks for fun.
description: Wan to Play is a forest-themed indoor playground located in i12 Katong. Kids will definitely make a beeline for the climbing walls and then slide down into the ball pit. The foam building blocks are real fun to stack and knock down too.
datetime_display: Monday to Friday, 9 am to 9 pm, Weekends & Public Holiday, 9.30 am to 10 pm

title: Space-themed Adventure at Kinex Mall
blurb: Trampoline, padded play frame, ball pits, and rides for kids.
description: Wan To Play Space at Kinex Mall is a space-themed indoor playground located in Kinex Mall. Kids can embark on an out-of-this-world adventure which has a trampoline area, padded play frame along with ball pits and rides.
datetime_display: Weekdays, 9 am to 9 pm; Weekends & Public Holiday, 9 am to 9 pm

title: Superhero-themed Play Area with Tallest Slide
blurb: 6,400 sq ft superhero play, obstacle courses, and ball pits.
description: Save the day with your favourite sidekick in the 6,400 sq ft Superhero themed play area at Bouncetopia SAFRA Choa Chu Kang. Bounce off walls and transform each obstacle course into your battleground. Get your blood pumping with the tallest slide in the house, sending you into a ball pit frenzy at the speed of light!
datetime_display: Sun to Thu, 10 am to 8 pm; Friday, Saturday & Public Holiday, 10 am to 9 pm

title: Huge Indoor Inflatable Play Space
blurb: 20,000 sq ft of bouncy castles, ball pits, and obstacle courses.
description: If you are looking for a place where kids can expend their energy, check out Bouncy Paradise. The indoor play space is huge with 20,000 square feet of space. It is filled with an unbelievable number of colourful bouncy castles, ball pits and fun obstacle course on inflatables for kids and parents to challenge themselves.
datetime_display_teaser: Weekends and Holidays, 10 am to 8 pm
datetime_display: Weekends and Holidays, 10 am to 8 pm

title: Farming-Themed Play Pit at West Coast Plaza
blurb: Seeds-filled play pit for farming-themed dig and play activities.
description: Jolly Fields is a seeds-filled play pit, equipped with tools for kids between 1 to 7 years old, to immerse in farming-themed dig and play activities.
datetime_display: Weekdays, 11 am to 8.30 pm; Weekends, 10.30 am to 9 pm

title: Science and Innovation for Young Minds
blurb: 3,000m² of interactive play for children aged 8 and below.
description: Designed especially for children aged 8 years and below, KidsSTOP is 3,000m² of science, and innovation for wee inquiring minds. While it might be one massive pretend-play indoor playground, there is also plenty of learning involved such as the importance of staying hydrated at the Drink Station, and about eating a balanced meal via My Healthy Plate.
datetime_display: Tuesdays to Sundays, 10 am to 1 pm, 2 pm to 5 pm

title: Towering Play Structure with Foam Blaster
blurb: Visually stunning interactive play elements in a large playground.
description: Many are awed by the indoor playground’s towering play structure at Kidz Amaze, SAFRA Jurong. You can go round and round, ascending the vertical, five-level colossus. And the centre of the tower is a foam blaster! Once at the top, there is a fun spiral tube slide that takes you down three storeys in a jiffy. It also has a Rainbow Maze as one of its play elements.
price_display: From $10, free for babies below 12 months
datetime_display: Monday to Friday, 1 pm to 7 pm; Weekends and Public Holidays, 10 am to 9 pm; School Holiday Weekdays, 10 am to 7 pm

title: Space Voyage at Jurong Point Play Universe
blurb: Netted climbing frames, role-play rooms, trampoline, carousel.
description: Young explorers are invited to go on a space voyage at Kiztopia Club Jurong Point! Decorated in an outer space theme, our 4,500 square feet play universe features 12 different play concepts including netted climbing frames, role-play rooms, trampoline, carousel, and even slides.
datetime_display: Sun – Thurs: 10am to 8.30pm. Fri – Sat, Eve of PH & PH: 10am to 9pm.

title: Safe Play Space for Babies and Young Children
blurb: Environment for crawling, quality toys, and parent bonding.
description: The Rocking Horse Playhouse Singapore aims to provide an environment where babies have a safe space to crawl, kids can play with quality toys and parents get the chance to bond with their kids through play, or take a seat on the sofa or at the pantry.
price_display: $32 for one child and one adult for two hours admission
datetime_display: 10 am to 6 pm, daily

title: Sub-Zero Temperature Snowy Experience Indoors
blurb: Snow play, sports lessons, and chilling fun all year round.
description: How does one keep cool and have a snowball fight on our sunny island? At Snow City Singapore, you can enter a unique chamber with sub-zero temperature that offers snowy experiences to visitors, young and old, throughout the year. Beyond the wintery space, you’ll find exciting programmes and snow sports lessons for some chilling fun and unique snow experience indoors round the year.
datetime_display: 10 am to 5 pm daily

title: Arts Engagement for Families at One Holland Village
blurb: Play space for children 0-9 and weekly art-based classes.
description: Located in a quiet space tucked away at one end of mall, The Artground @ One Holland Village is designed to encourage everyone in the family to engage in the arts. There is a play space for children between the ages of 0 to 9 and weekly art-based classes will also be conducted for kids and families.
datetime_display: Daily with multiple timeslots

title: Transportation-themed Playland at Bukit Batok
blurb: Trampolines, tunnels, slides, and a dedicated toddler section.
description: From airport check-in counters to heli landing pads, your children will have the time of their lives at T-Play, Bukit Batok. The 4,200 square feet indoor playground is home to the trampolines, tunnels, slides, ball pits, and even a dedicated toddler play section.
datetime_display: Tuesday to Thursday, 1 pm to 7 pm; Friday, Eve of Public Holiday, 1 pm to 9 pm; Saturday, Sunday, School Holiday & PH, 10 am to 9 pm
